fr.sii.ogham.core.convert

Class DelegateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.convert.DelegateConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter, ConverterRegistry
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultConverter

    public class DelegateConverter
extends Object
implements Converter, ConverterRegistry
    Calls registered SupportingConverters to make the real conversion. It asks each SupportingConverter if it can make the conversion. If the SupportingConverter can do the conversion, the conversion is applied using that SupportingConverter and the result is immediately returned. If none of the registered SupportingConverters can make the conversion, then a ConversionException is thrown. If the source is null, then the result is null too. Registration order is important.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
